title: Revert Morgana change.
body: I see Morgana jungle every single day since the change and god this is cancerous. Do nothing but spam their binding and where you get caught out, it's basically over. Morgana annoyance was already bothersome on support role spamming their black shield and binding you to death, now she is everywhere and jesus this is toxic to face. Revert Morg change.. i don't get what been throught your head Riot... but those retarded change need to stop.

replies.body: More AP junglers is a good thing.

> [{quoted}](name=vgamedude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=podJldER,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-12-10T07:25:59.740+0000)
>
> More AP junglers is a good thing.

Not when they get pigeon holed there by Riot randomly..
Pigeon holed how? Morg can still mid and sup as well.

> [{quoted}](name=vgamedude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=podJldER,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-12-12T00:41:33.775+0000)
>
> Pigeon holed how? Morg can still mid and sup as well.

She wasn't made to jungle, and this change had no real sense or reason to back it up.
She wasn't made to be a support either. What's your point exactly?

> [{quoted}](name=Attticus Finch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=podJldER,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-12T01:20:11.162+0000)
>
> She wasn't made to be a support either. What's your point exactly?

No she was made to be a mid. Jungle isn't her role, period.
And yet shes played support more then shes played mid and has been for years. How come you aren't whining your ass about that?
So having another option as far as a champion to AP jungle with is a bad thing how? What does it matter what she was "made for" if it works?
so. as annoying as it may be, i am glad to see new faces in the jungle that work.

Morgana should excel at every role. Would fit her thematically as the Divine being she is. 

Buff her AA range riot. Make adc Morgana a thing as well. 

Git gud about her binding.

Here's a trick to deal with Morgana's Dark Binding...
Right click the map and walk away from it...
nerf her. she does not belong anywhere besides support at bot.
Sounds like a binding balance issue and not a lifestealing poison ground mechanic issue.
